idea:
We R Consultants LLP is dedicated to assist entrepreneurs to easily start and run their business successfully, at an affordable cost and with the peace of mind. WeR Consultants started in October 2014 from its first office in "City of Dreams" of India i.e. Mumbai. We are offering Company Registration, Trademark Registration, Gst Registration and Return Filing, ITR Filing and FSSAI Registration, Website Design & Development, Ecommerce Development, Custom Web Applications and Digital Marketing Services. We also provide services in other cities like Jaipur, Delhi, Lucknow, Vadodara, Deoria, Udaipur, Gujarat and PAN India.

Currently we are having our presence in more than Eight Cities and helping entrepreneurs in legal compliance related to starting and running their business. WeR Consultants has its own in-house team of Professionals to serve its customer efficiently throughout India seamlessly.click here for website
name: WER CONSULTANTS LLP

idea: The company ROCKWATER AND STILL PRIVATE LIMITED registered on Sixteenth day of July Two thousand twenty vide CIN U15549MH2020PTC342022. Rock Water and Still will follow B2B model to do sales in domestic market and export of locally processed Gin and Vodka. The company focuses on creating a unique and distinctive brand identity, differentiation and brand recall for itself. As India is increasingly becoming a tourist destination, we foresee the demand for our products in tourist friendly regions and hospitality sector.
name: ROCKWATER AND STILL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
In today's world there is huge decomposition of Electronic Goods like Mobile, Handsets, TV's, Laptops, Desktops.....People tend to buy the latest products and sell off or dispose the old products. But there is a very big segment who cannot afford to buy new electronic gadgets like mobile, Laptops .....


We at Refurbished IT Solutions Pvt Ltd (RITS)collect all these products and if there is possibility to refurbish them to make it usable for another set of people at a affordable cost - they could learn from those electronic products, our aim to serve the society is achieved. Plus those products which cant be repaired or are not usable we destroy them under ewaste norms.
name: REFURBISHED IT SOLUTIONS PVT LTD

idea: Live Equal Foundation For Philanthropy is a nonprofit force dedicated to removing inequity from this world. We are a registered Non-profit under Section 8 of the Indian Companies Act, 2013, founded in 2021.
name: Live Equal Foundation For Philanthropy

idea:
Airrchip is a technology services startup that builds enterprise applications for global enterprises . 


We use the cloud-first strategy to develop highly scalable apps and platforms for our customers in industries such as BFSI/Fintech , Retail E-commerce & Cross-domain startups . 


Airrchip specializes in 4 key areas in its services offerings such as End-to-End Product Engineering , Enterprise Digital Transformation , Team-as-a-Service & Product Integration Partnerships . 


With our past engagements we drive experience in working with customers not just in India but also in the US , UK , Europe , Middle East , Singapore & Australia and have had the opportunity to build apps & platforms for large enterprises such as Deloitte Consulting US , Atos Worldline , Future Group , Go Markets , UPL , Boiron , Amazon Audible & many more .
name: Airrchip
